methods.name: public static void maybeUpgradeRules(Context context, ZenModeConfig config)
methods.comment: Updates existing system-owned rules to use the new Modes fields (type, etc).

methods.name: public static boolean isSystemOwnedRule(ZenRule rule)
methods.comment:
* Returns whether the rule corresponds to a system ConditionProviderService (i.e. it is owned
     * by the "android" package).

methods.name: private static void upgradeSystemProviderRule(Context context, ZenRule rule)
public static boolean updateTriggerDescription(Context context, ZenRule rule)
methods.comment:
* Updates the {@link ZenRule#triggerDescription} of the system-owned rule based on the schedule
     * or event condition encoded in its {@link ZenRule#conditionId}.
     *
     * @return {@code true} if the trigger description was updated.

methods.name: private static boolean updateTriggerDescription(ZenRule rule, String triggerDescription)
public static String getTriggerDescriptionForScheduleTime(Context context, @NonNull ScheduleInfo schedule)
methods.comment:
* Returns a suitable trigger description for a time-schedule rule (e.g. "Mon-Fri, 8:00-10:00"),
     * using the Context's current locale.

methods.name: private static String getShortDaysSummary(Context context, @NonNull ScheduleInfo schedule)
methods.comment:
* Returns an ordered summarized list of the days on which this schedule applies, with
     * adjacent days grouped together ("Sun-Wed" instead of "Sun,Mon,Tue,Wed").

methods.name: private static String timeString(Context context, int hour, int minute)
methods.comment: * Convenience method for representing the specified time in string format.

methods.name: public static String getTriggerDescriptionForScheduleEvent(Context context, @NonNull EventInfo event)
methods.comment:
* Returns a suitable trigger description for a calendar-schedule rule (either the name of the
     * calendar, or a message indicating all calendars are included).

methodNames: public static void maybeUpgradeRules(Context context, ZenModeConfig config)
private static void upgradeSystemProviderRule(Context context, ZenRule rule)
public static boolean updateTriggerDescription(Context context, ZenRule rule)
private static boolean updateTriggerDescription(ZenRule rule, String triggerDescription)
public static String getTriggerDescriptionForScheduleTime(Context context, @NonNull ScheduleInfo schedule)
private static String getShortDaysSummary(Context context, @NonNull ScheduleInfo schedule)
private static String timeString(Context context, int hour, int minute)
public static String getTriggerDescriptionForScheduleEvent(Context context, @NonNull EventInfo event)
